name: The Operative
description: You've got special forces training. You live in a morally gray world where you've done some terrible things for the benefit of your homeland. You are among the world's most skilled in stealth, explosives, and espionage.

moves.name: Shadow in the night
moves.description: You are incredibly stealthy, especially during the night (automatic 10 on act under pressure rolls when sneaking at night)

moves.name: Army of one
moves.description: When you are alone, you deal twice as much harm as normal when kicking ass

moves.name: Explosives expert
moves.description: If there's a way for an explosion to help, you'll find it (+1 to all rolls when using explosives)

moves.name: Intelligence gatherer
moves.description: You know how to get the information you need (+1 investigate, read a bad situation)

moves.name: Level headed
moves.description: You've been trained to keep calm in even the most stressful situations (+1 act under pressure)

moves.name: The best defense
moves.description: You deal 1 harm to the enemy while protecting someone

moves.name: Interrogation tactics
moves.description: You can get people to cooperate when you have them in your custody (+1 manipulate someone)

items.name: Night vision goggles
tags: +1 investigate, read a bad situation in the dark

items.name: Binoculars
tags: +1 investigate, read a bad situation at a distance

items.name: Plastic explosives
tags: plant, then detonate from a safe distance

histories: This explorer trained under you a long time ago
This explorer disapproves of your methods
Someone this explorer cared for died as collateral damage from one of your operations
This explorer has a tendency to ruin your plans
This explorer is afraid of you
This explorer is weirdly more violent than you are
